room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: My family and I did Hostage and it was exactly the challenge we were looking for. The puzzles test your teamwork and critical thinking skills to make breaking out very rewarding.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: We had an amazing time!! Hostage was intense, but we broke out! Cannot wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: We completed the “Hostage room” and it was awesome! Our game master, Andrew, was amazing! His hints were strategic enough to get us moving without giving out too much info! This is our 2nd escape room there and we’ll keep going back !

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: Had a great time yesterday at Breakout Games. A friend and I did Hostage. It's was awesome, and the employee Mike was great. He made the game very enjoyable and I would definitely do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: Most fun I've had in forever. We did the Hostage room and it was so challenging. We got out and I'm still excited 24 hrs later. We are going back to do them all!
